# Main Tag

## Overview

Ansible tag for deploying your Sandbox apps stack.

## Deployment

```sh
sb install sandbox-roles
```

## Role Defaults

!!! info
    Variables can be overridden in `/srv/git/saltbox/inventories/host_vars/localhost.yml`.

    ```yaml title="Example Override"
    : 
    ```
